DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of two Metronidazole Gels 1%, in the treatment of Rosacea.
DOC.brief_title: A Therapeutic Equivalence Study of Two Metronidazole Gel 1% Topical Treatments of Rosacea
DOC.criteria: Male or Female subjects with at least 18 years of age; Read and signed ICF; Clinical Diagnosis of Rosacea; Females who are pregnant, lactating or of childbearing potential who are not using or do not agree to use an acceptable form of contraception; Any skin condition that would interfere with treatment of rosacea Use of prohibited medications
